Hear
               
              me
               
              with
               
              patience
              .

speaker: PLEBEIANS
text:
Peace
              ,
               
              ho
              !

speaker: ANTONY
text:
Moreover
              ,
               
              he
               
              hath
               
              left
               
              you
               
              all
               
              his
               
              walks
              ,

speaker: ANTONY
text:
His
               
              private
               
              arbors
              ,
               
              and
               
              new-planted
               
              orchards
              ,

speaker: ANTONY
text:
On
               
              this
               
              side
               
              Tiber
              .
               
              He
               
              hath
               
              left
               
              them
               
              you
              ,

speaker: ANTONY
text:
And
               
              to
               
              your
               
              heirs
               
              forever
              —
              common
               
              pleasures

speaker: ANTONY
text:
To
               
              walk
               
              abroad
               
              and
               
              recreate
               
              yourselves
              .

speaker: ANTONY
text:
Here
               
              was
               
              a
               
              Caesar
              !
               
              When
               
              comes
               
              such
               
              another
              ?

speaker:
FIRST
               
              PLEBEIAN
text:
Never
              ,
               
              never
              !
              —
              Come
              ,
               
              away
              ,
               
              away
              !

speaker:
FIRST
               
              PLEBEIAN
text:
We’ll
               
              burn
               
              his
               
              body
               
              in
               
              the
               
              holy
               
              place

speaker:
FIRST
               
              PLEBEIAN
text:
And
               
              with
               
              the
               
              brands
               
              fire
               
              the
               
              traitors’
               
              houses
              .

speaker:
FIRST
               
              PLEBEIAN
text:
Take
               
              up
               
              the
               
              body
              .

speaker:
SECOND
               
              PLEBEIAN
text:
Go
               
              fetch
               
              fire
              .

speaker:
THIRD
               
              PLEBEIAN
text:
Pluck
               
              down
               
              benches
              .

speaker:
FOURTH
               
              PLEBEIAN
text:
Pluck
               
              down
               
              forms
              ,
               
              windows
              ,

speaker:
FOURTH
               
              PLEBEIAN
text:
anything
              .

speaker: ANTONY
text:
Now
               
              let
               
              it
               
              work
              .
               
              Mischief
              ,
               
              thou
               
              art
               
              afoot
              ;

speaker: ANTONY
text:
Take
               
              thou
               
              what
               
              course
               
              thou
               
              wilt
              .

speaker: ANTONY
text:
How
               
              now
              ,
               
              fellow
              ?

speaker: SERVANT
text:
Sir
              ,
               
              Octavius
               
              is
               
              already
               
              come
               
              to
               
              Rome
              .

speaker: ANTONY
text:
Where
               
              is
               
              he
              ?

speaker: SERVANT
text:
He
               
              and
               
              Lepidus
               
              are
               
              at
               
              Caesar’s
               
              house
              .

speaker: ANTONY
text:
And
               
              thither
               
              will
               
              I
               
              straight
               
              to
               
              visit
               
              him
              .

speaker: ANTONY
text:
He
               
              comes
               
              upon
               
              a
               
              wish
              .
               
              Fortune
               
              is
               
              merry

speaker: ANTONY
text:
And
               
              in
               
              this
               
              mood
               
              will
               
              give
               
              us
               
              anything
              .

speaker: SERVANT
text:
I
               
              heard
               
              him
               
              say
               
              Brutus
               
              and
               
              Cassius

speaker: SERVANT
text:
Are
               
              rid
               
              like
               
              madmen
               
              through
               
              the
               
              gates
               
              of
               
              Rome
              .

speaker: ANTONY
text:
Belike
               
              they
               
              had
               
              some
               
              notice
               
              of
               
              the
               
              people

speaker: ANTONY
text:
How
               
              I
               
              had
               
              moved
               
              them
              .
               
              Bring
               
              me
               
              to
               
              Octavius
              .
